Translations.Text: Ma Issuget Oebbi l$it i imdanen iS, ad be$wven di tmurt. Maca, Issrusu d, s lmizan, ayen i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Ippuxebbeo $ef imdanen iS, Ipwali ten
D Neppa id Isse$layen ageffur mara aysen. Iweppaa aeunu S. Neppa d Bab, d Amaazuz
Seg issekniyen iS, lxelq n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan n leweuc, degsen. Izmer Neppa, ma ihwa yaS, a ten id Issemlil
Kra n tiyta ikwen iwwten, siwa ayen d bbwin ifassen nnwen. Aias i Ipsemmie
Ur tezmirem a ppesfunngem di tmurt. Ur awen illi, war Oebbi, bab ne$ asettao
Seg issekniyen iS, ssfinat di yill, amzun d idurar
Ma ihwa yaS ad Issens avu, ad eebsent, d tusbivin sufella s. War ccekk, ayagi d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ne$ a ten Issenger ilmend n wayen kesben. Aias i Ipsemmie
Ad eoen wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nne£, ar ur asen illi ssoan
Ayen akw i wen ippunefken n wayla, d zzhu n tmeddurt di ddunit. Ayen illan ar Oebbi, yif it; ad idum kteo, i wid iumnen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
wid ijunben ibekkaven ibararen, akked laao, u ssurufen i wid i ten isserfan
wid id ipjawaben i Mass nnsen, peallan, ppemcawaoen $ef lameo nnsen, pseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at
wid, ma iusa ten lbe$wv, ad qablen
Aqeiii n tucmip, d tucmip i p icban. Win isemmeen, issweqmen, arraz is ar Oebbi. Neppa, ih, ur Ieemmel ara imednas
Ma d wid id irran ppao mi pwadensen, ur telli tiyta degsen
Tiyta, kan, deg wid ivuooen imdanen, iqehoen di tmurt, war ssebba. I wigi, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ma d win iueboen, isemmeen, ayagi, s tidep, d aseyyi n lumuo
Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai bab, deffir eS. A pwaliv imednas, mara eoen aaaqeb, ad inin: "ma illa ubrid n tu$alin

A ten twaliv pwafessren fellas, ndellen, ggaren tii s tugwdi. Ad inin wid iumnen: "imexsuoen, s tidep, d wid i sxesoen iman nnsen, akked twacult nnsen, ass n tnekra". War ccekk, deg uaaqeb imezgi, ara yilin imednas
Ur asen llin imawlan, ara ten isellken, war Oebbi. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai abrid
Jawbet i Mass nnwen, uqbel a d ias, s$uo Oebbi, ass ur nepwexxio. Ur awen ippili ssoan assen, ur tezmirem a pnekoem
Ma numren, ur k id Nuzen ara d ameareb nnsen. Ay fellak, siwa timenna. Ih, mara Neseess i umdan aeunu s$uone£, ad ifoee yis. Mara t tsami tucmip, id bbwin ifassen is, s tidep, amdan ad ikaraa
N Oebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Ippak nnta i win i S ihwan, Ippak ddkeo i win i S ihwan
Ne$ Ipcarak ddkeo d nnta. Isaaqao win i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Issen, Izmer
